verbs.description: [ARG1: another illinois child] [V: diagnosed] [ARG2: with rare but serious poliolike condition total] now stands at 10 a 10th child in illinois has now been diagnosed with the poliolike condition known as acute flaccid myelitis which causes paralysis and difficulty swallowing according to state health officials all of the recent cases have arisen in northern illinois but illinois department of public health officials did not provide any more detailed information about the most recent case or the other cases lurie children hospital has treated at least batavia illinois illinois department of public health cdc dr marcelo malakooti lurie children hospital medical director batavia myelitis child poliomyelitis dr marcelo malakooti centers for disease control and prevention afm polio emalagon chicagotribune com northern illinois minnesota illinois lurie childrens hospital slurred speech julia payne
